title: Fix Your Matchmatching Riot
body:

replies.body: Dude it's only normals... Don't complain about vsing people too good because if you go in with the right attitude you might learn a thing or two from decent players.

diamond people duo'ing with their low level friends.
How is matchmaking supposed to handle diamond people doing that? force the level 18's to play diamonds?

how about you don't look at other websites pre-game so you don't psych yourself out? play the game.

if you are getting sht on, kindly ask for advice, get told your crap and should uninstall, mute the person, don't re-que immediately because you're pissed off, re-que, rage at the smallest things the next game because you are still annoyed, close league, come back tomorrow

{{summoner:3}}

lmao
funny thing was i checked after the match because i knew their gameplay and playstyle was definitely not that of my level.

the point of this post isn't to brag and complain how i got %%%% on, it's to ask how riot matchmaking works and why this stuff happens.
even if the diamonds queue with the lvl 18, wouldn't it be more even level to get matched with golds/silvers?
Logically, lvl 18 and Diamonds, that's nearly opposite ends of the level spectrum.

My point is, why does riot match diamonds even when queued with lvl 18s, with the highest rank of silver 4 on the other team as well as 3 pre-30 players?

The Ranked and the Normal games uses different MMR.

So in other words, you can tank your mmr pretty low to crush noobs without any consequences like losing lp for example. While on the other hand, premading raises your mmr I think.

So if you have a bunch of low level banding up in a normal game, it's likely they face diamonds sooner or later. Some diamonds queue normal games when there're no games around for them because the queue time is horrendously long.

The smaller amount of total population and unfavourable play time like mid night or later also helps the issue.

All in all, it's totally possible.
Ranked MMR != Normal MMR Firstly, also you are obviously smurfing so nut up.
